unnormalised: **EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!**
normalised: EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals – Your Ticket to Vidya!

unnormalised: Struggling to find that sweet scholarship, folks? Well, ditch the chai break anxiety because ed-tech is here to rescue you! Scholarship portals are becoming all the rage, making the hunt for funding less of a Khajuraho mystery and more like a well-organized picnic.
normalised: Struggling to find that sweet scholarship, folks? Well, ditch the chai break anxiety because ed-tech is here to rescue you! Scholarship portals are becoming all the rage, making the hunt for funding less of a Khajuraho mystery and more like a well-organized picnic.

unnormalised: Imagine a single website where you can find scholarships for everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to Kathak dance classes – that's the magic of these portals. Sites like "Vidya Dhan" and "Scholarship Guru" are booming, connecting students like Rohan from Patna to opportunities they never knew existed.
normalised: Imagine a single website where you can find scholarships for everything from engineering at I I T Delhi to Kathak dance classes – that's the magic of these portals. Sites like "Vidya Dhan" and "Scholarship Guru" are booming, connecting students like Rohan from Patna to opportunities they never knew existed.

unnormalised: These platforms are loaded with listings and updated regularly (think every Tuesday at 11:00 AM sharp!). Plus, many offer personalized recommendations based on your profile – so no more scrolling through endless pages! Application deadlines, eligibility criteria... it's all there, baby! Some even offer mock interviews for those prestigious awards. Remember that "Inspire Scholarship" Rohan was eyeing? He found it and applied by the 31/12/2023 deadline thanks to one of these portals!
normalised: These platforms are loaded with listings and updated regularly (think every Tuesday at eleven zero zero A M sharp!). Plus, many offer personalized recommendations based on your profile – so no more scrolling through endless pages! Application deadlines, eligibility criteria... it's all there, baby! Some even offer mock interviews for those prestigious awards. Remember that "Inspire Scholarship" Rohan was eyeing? He found it and applied by the thirty first december two thousand and twenty three deadline thanks to one of these portals!

unnormalised: So, whether you're aiming for a PhD or just need Rs. 50,000 for that coding bootcamp starting on 10/07/2024, these scholarship portals are your digital guide. Happy hunting, and may the funding gods be ever in your favor!
normalised: So, whether you're aiming for a P H D or just need rupee fifty thousand for that coding bootcamp starting on tenth july two thousand and twenty four, these scholarship portals are your digital guide. Happy hunting, and may the funding gods be ever in your favor!
